channel.title: CVE Feed for ZUKEN Elmic -- Kasago IPv6/v4 Dual
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZUKEN Elmic -- Kasago IPv6/v4 Dual

item.title: CVE-2022-43501|2024-08-03T13:32:59.196Z -- zuken%20elmic -- kasago%20ipv6%2Fv4%20dual
item.description: KASAGO TCP/IP stack provided by Zuken Elmic generates ISNs(Initial Sequence Number) for TCP connections from an insufficiently random source. An attacker may be able to determine the ISN of the current or future TCP connections and either hijack existing ones or spoof future ones.
